explains: v. （使）紧密连接；连结（interlock 的现在分词）
n. 紧密连接；紧紧相扣
wordGroup: interlocking system 联锁系统；互锁系统
safety interlocking 安全联锁；保安联锁

sentences.en: The maze is actually two interlocking spirals.
sentences.cn: 这个迷宫实际上是两个连锁的螺旋体。

sentences.en: India's futuristic new Bharathi base, built on stilts using 134 interlocking shipping containers, resembles a spaceship.
sentences.cn: 印度未来主义的新 Bharathi 基地，用134个相互交错的集装箱撑起，看起来像一艘宇宙飞船。

sentences.en: Our ties with people often deepen as we interact with them across time and gradually evolve interlocking habits and interests.
sentences.cn: 随着时间的推移，我们与他人的互动不断加深，并逐渐形成相互关联的习惯和兴趣。
